ðŸ“– Summary: Serpl is a terminal user interface (TUI) application written in Rust that enables users to search and replace keywords within an entire project folder, offering similar functionality to VS Code. It supports features like case sensitivity, AST Grep, interactive preview of search results, and customizable key bindings.
